document.heading: Special Education Task Force Expansion Temporary Amendment Act of 2002

history.narrative: Law 14-262, the “Special Education Task Force Expansion Temporary Amendment Act of 2002”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 14-944, and was retained by Council. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 7, 2002, and December 3, 2002, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 23, 2002, it was assigned Act No. 14-559 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 14-262 became effective on March 27, 2003.
